thread.title: Trump to Add Some Muscle to U.S. Strategy to Fight Islamic State
thread.title_full: Trump to Add Some Muscle to U.S. Strategy to Fight Islamic State - WSJ

author: Gordon Lubold
title: Trump to Add Some Muscle to U.S. Strategy to Fight Islamic State
text:
WASHINGTON—President Donald Trump’s new strategy to accelerate the fight against Islamic State will, at least initially, tweak and add a little more muscle to the existing plan, U.S. officials said.

Defense Secretary Jim Mattis is expected to provide to Mr. Trump a series of recommendations for that plan in the coming days. Mr. Trump on Jan. 28 signed an order directing his new Pentagon chief to come up with a preliminary draft of...
